Package org.eclipse.smarthome.core.items.events

Class ItemEventFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.smarthome.core.events.AbstractEventFactory
      • org.eclipse.smarthome.core.items.events.ItemEventFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventFactory
    public class ItemEventFactory
extends AbstractEventFactory
    An ItemEventFactory is responsible for creating item event instances, e.g. ItemCommandEvents and ItemStateEvents.
    Author:
    Stefan Bu√üweiler - Initial contribution

        topic - the topic

        public static ItemCommandEvent createCommandEvent​(String itemName,
                                                  Command command,
                                                  String source)
        Creates an item command event.
        Parameters:
        itemName - the name of the item to send the command for
        command - the command to send
        source - the name of the source identifying the sender (can be null)
        Returns:
        the created item command event
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if itemName or command is null
